item.title: Get a login account
item.description: This article explains how to apply for access to the shared JASMIN servers. There is a video tutorial available on Access login server Get a login account   A user with a jasmin -login account is allocated a HOME directory of 100GB and can access the shared JASMIN servers (Scientific servers, data transfer servers) and the LOTUS batch cluster.
